article_metadata.description: Approximately half of the accountable care organizations participating in the Medicare Shared Savings Program earned bonuses during their first year. But the top ACOs in the MSSP have earned millions. This slideshow, compiled from the Center for Medicare & Medicaid Services’ MSSP ACO Performance Year 1 dataset, shows the top 10 ACOs ranked by earned payments. All started their program agreement in 2012 and earned their performance payments by providing complete and accurate reporting for all quality measures.
